Events that occurred on 26 December.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1926 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1929 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1964 - The twelfth episode of the Princess-serialization of The Hobbit is published.
1971 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Joy Hill.
2000 - Actor Michael Deacon dies.
2000 - Composer Paul Kont dies.
2004 - Actor Garard Green dies.
2012 - The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey is released in Australia.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
The Fellowship of the Ring travels south along the Misty Mountains.
